reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The MEAL and quality assurance component aims to ensure we have a strong programme management system in place to enable us to deliver high quality results. To this end, Plan will make a significant investment into improving the M+E and knowledge management systems during the programme period. There is a need to strengthen the culture of Results Based Management, improve processes and understanding on indicators and methods for measuring change, and address the challenges in aggregating data at the programme level. Specifically, the quality assurance and MEAL components will allow us to capture the long-term effects of the programme on behavioral and gender transformative change and to have a robust evidence base to inform management decisions and overall lea rning as well as reporting and communicating results. Directly this benefits Plan Country Offices and Programme Units and the implementing partner CSOs by strengthening the capacity in project management and M+E. The quality assurance and MEAL components w ill be implemented by Plan Finland.
